title: (x) "Los Lunes al Sol" opening titles - Lucida Sans {Ignacio}
content:
There is a spanish movie called something like "Monday at the sun" (Lunes por el sol, en espa�ol, Segunda-feira ao sol, em portugu�s) with Javier Barden, that uses a great typography for the credits.   
   
Did anybody see this movie??   
What font is that?
author: fermello78

comments.content: [Los Lunes al Sol](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221441/http:/www.loslunesalsol.com/) (mondays at the sun) is about unemployed people, that's the reason of the title. Awesome movie, awesome Bardem, nice music. You must see it if you have the chance.

Yes, thats the movie, but the font that appears in the beginning of it isn't that one that appears on the website or the poster...   
Did you see the movie?

Yes, I saw the movie (I would't said that it is awesome if I hadn't see it), but Fernando... I just can't remember the opening titles, sorry, can you describe the typography a little, maybe so I'll remember... (difficult thing).   
Anyway, I have a friend working in one of the production companies that made the movie, I'll call him tomorrow. I am almost sure he can find it out.

Ok, thanks Ignacio.   
The font is a light sans serif, which letter "a" in lower case is similar to Meta but very light...   
thanks again!

Fernando, this is taken longer than what I thought, it looks that lunes, hopefully sunny,   
I will have an answer.   
   
I hope this is "just" for pleasure and you are not in hurry for a work or something...

Oh, no, no hurry, Ignacio...   
   
Thanks a lot for helping!

[Imagen Line](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221441/http:/www.imagenline.es/) made the opening titles for the movie, but it seems that the designer that was in charge of the job is no longer working for them and they couldn't give any answer about the font. My friend now is trying other way , but meanwhile, curiosity killed the cat and I made these screenshots of the movie, could it be [Lucida Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221441/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/lucida-sans/) ?   
   
 ![los lunes al sol](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221441im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21596.jpg)   
Sorry, I can't get better resolution.
De nada Fernando, was the perfect excuse to see the movie again.
